location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Stephen Babbington, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the commands of the Bombay Government dated 24 November 1811, which instructed the Resident to obtain a report of the assets at Bushire of the late Aga Mahomed Bhubaney and to determine whether the parties in possession will agree to the amount being remitted to the Bushire Residency for the general settlement of the concern. It notes that the Resident will have to apply to the Governor of Bushire, as he is the only person with the authority to furnish such a statement.
